title.jcr:title:
RELIFE is the innovative aesthetics company harnessing expert precision, 
progressive technology and timeless Italian style.

text.text:
We believe in crafting personalised, holistic treatment approaches that celebrate  

individual beauty and provide complete well-being. Our commitment lies in providing

unparalleled, bespoke approaches to ensure every patient achieves a truly timeless and natural look.

card.jcr:description: The product of over a century’s pharmaceutical heritage and significant dermatological expertise of Menarini, RELIFE is the innovative aesthetics company harnessing expert precision, progressive technology and timeless Italian style.
card.jcr:title: A HERITAGE OF EXCELLENCE

card_1195635830.jcr:description: From Firenze, RELIFE embraces effortless Italian beauty with charisma, quality and style. We develop holistic treatments that, in combination, work in harmony for individualised treatment protocols and timeless beauty.
card_1195635830.jcr:title: TIMELESS ITALIAN STYLE

card_1671987272.jcr:description: Our unique 5R approach to holistic aesthetic treatments is designed to deliver comprehensive solutions to meet individual patient needs. Developed in partnership with some of the world's top independent aesthetic specialists.
card_1671987272.jcr:title: HOLISTIC AESTHETIC MEDICINE

card_206739373.jcr:description: Continued excellence is ensured by our unparalleled RELIFE Academy, providing world class training and support to our clinical practitioners and enabling consistent world class results.
card_206739373.jcr:title: ASSURED RESULTS

card_1706095054.jcr:description: Clinical excellence and continuous innovation is in our DNA, driving ongoing refinement of aesthetics technology across all our DefinisseTM product ranges – redefining the possibilities of non-surgical rejuvenation and pre-juvenation treatments to meet individual patient needs.
card_1706095054.jcr:title: PROGRESSIVE SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

card_1473074904.jcr:description: RELIFE partners with experts and aesthetic thought leaders from around the world to empower practitioners and patients with the highest quality products, training, education and support. This collaboration with international partners also creates synergies that give rise to new cutting-edge solutions and services in the aesthetics market.

title_514108884.jcr:title:
Since our foundation in 2017 and as part of the Menarini Group (a leading pharmaceutical company
from Italy), we have shown significant, steady growth and market expansion. 
Here are a few of our exciting highlights:

text.text:
Foundation of RELIFE Company
Launch of  Fillers & Threads

Clinical enhancements to dermatology offerings
Expansion into 6 APAC regions

Entry into Ireland and Russia

Global strategic partnership for Definisse™ HA Fillers

Acquisition of Dermafil Threads

title_514108884_copy.jcr:title:
We aim to redefine aesthetic skincare by harnessing expert precision, progressive technology and timeless
Italian style for the best patient experience and outcomes.
